GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users

users.user_about_me: Currus texo quaerat quisquam cornu sustineo demoror usque.

GET /api/users/:user_id.description: Serves an individual user with given user_id parameter

exampleResponse.user_about_me: Currus texo quaerat quisquam cornu sustineo demoror usque.

PATCH /api/users/:user_id.description: serves a user with the value updated when given a value to be updated and a user_id parameter

DELETE /api/users/:user_id.description: serves a 204 status response when a given comment is deleted

GET /api/busks.description: Serves an array of all busks

busks.busk_about_me: Video solium ad utrimque sodalitas. Comitatus demulceo ascisco sol amo clementia tero argumentum ventus repellendus. Ullam beneficium somniculosus.
Comburo molestiae decet beatus depulso supra sequi vado. Congregatio ager fugiat spero. Amissio aliquid maiores venustas vitium deleniti cupiditate libero decet.
busks.busk_setup: Altus nulla asperiores beatae solum comburo cubicularis admiratio.

GET /api/busks/:busk_id.description: Serves a single busk with given busk_id parameter

exampleResponse.busk_about_me: Video solium ad utrimque sodalitas. Comitatus demulceo ascisco sol amo clementia tero argumentum ventus repellendus. Ullam beneficium somniculosus.

POST /api/busks.description: creates a new busk and insterts it into an array of all busks

requestFormatExample.busk_about_me: Non admitto aliqua desolo totam depono tonsor. Culpo synagoga territorio compono adulatio inflammatio soluta. Desparatus caute casus.
requestFormatExample.busk_setup: Sint adopto aperiam aliqua alius stips vesica cum.

exampleResponse.comment: Your busk has been successfully posted

DELETE /api/busks/:busk_id.description: serves a 204 status response when a given busk is deleted
